name: 林鈞陶
objective:
本課程主要探討線性代數基本理論，而教學目標在於使學生對矩陣行為能有基本
的掌握度。課程綱要如以下:
一、矩陣基本運算
二、向量空間
三、特徵值與特徵向量
四、最小平方法
五、對稱矩陣與么正矩陣
六、矩陣分解
schedule:
(實際授課進度將視教學狀況調整)
Week 1: Introduction.
Week 2: Linear Equations in Algebra.
Week 3: Linear Equations in Algebra. 
Week 4: Matrix Algebra.
Week 5: Matrix Algebra.
Week 6: Midterm I.
Week 7: Determinants.
Week 8: Vector Space.
Week 9: Vector Space.
Week 10: Eigenvalues and Eigenvectors. 
Week 11: Midterm II
Week 12: Eigenvalues and Eigenvectors. 
Week 13: Eigenvalues and Eigenvectors.
Week 14: Orthogonality and Least Squares.
Week 15: Orthogonality and Least Squares. 
Week 16: Symmetric Matrices and Quadratic Forms.
Week 17: Matrix decompositions.
Week 18: Final Exam.
